GENERAL FEATURES.Business Features: Document Viewer, Pushmail  (Mail for Exchange, Active Sync)
GENERAL FEATURES.Call Features: Conference Call, Hands Free, Loudspeaker, Call Divert
GENERAL FEATURES.In the Box: Handset, Battery (1300 mAh), Charger, Headset, Data Cable, User Guide, Quick Guide

Multimedia.Video Player: Yes, Supports 3GPP, MPEG-4, H.263, H.264, WMV 9, ASF

Camera.Other Camera Features: Geo-tagging, Face Detection, Touch Focus, Red-eye Reduction, Continuous Auto Focus, Auto and Manual White Balance, Auto Exposure, Image Editor

Internet & Connectivity.Bluetooth: Yes, v2.1, Supported Profiles (EDR, A2DP 1.2, AVCTP 1.0, AVCTP 1.3, AVDTP 1.0, AVDTP 1.2, AVRCP 1.0, GAP, GAVDP 1.2, HFP 1.5, HSP 1.1, IOP, L2CAP, PBAP 1.0, RFCOMM 1.0, SDP)
Internet & Connectivity.Navigation Technology: A-GPS, with Nokia Maps, Bing Maps

Other Features.Additional Features: Calendar, To-do List, Flight Mode, Games, MMS Enabled, Audio and Video Streaming, Active Noise Cancellation, Microsoft Zune, Clock, Calculator, Dedicated Keys, Voice Input, Bluetooth Support Only for Transferring Contacts and Messages, Voice Input
Other Features.Important Apps: Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Nokia Email, Gmail, Yahoo Mail, Windows Live, Hotmail, Instant Messaging, Flickr, Picasa, Twitter, YouTube
Other Features.Sensors: 3D Accelerometer, Ambient Light Sensor, Proximity Sensor

Warranty.Warranty Summary: 1 year manufacturer warranty for Phone and 6 months warranty for in the box accessories
